summary: This is an email exchange from December 7, 2007, regarding the Epstein case. An Assistant U.S. Attorney is inquiring about sending a victim notification letter and whether copies can be sent to Mr. Josefsberg. The email originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida.

persons.name: Josefsberg
persons.role: Recipient of victim notification letter copy
persons.context: The Assistant U.S. Attorney asks if it is alright to send copies of the victim notification letter to Mr. Josefsberg.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney is seeking guidance on sending a victim notification letter in the Epstein case.
The email inquires whether copies of the victim notification letter can be sent to Mr. Josefsberg.
The correspondence is dated December 7, 2007, indicating ongoing legal proceedings at that time.
The email originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida.
